sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Railway Employees Water Act.

sections.heading: Employees while operating a railroad or railway locomotive or while
sections.text:
working in or near a caboose on a train shall be provided by their employer
with an adequate supply of safe, clean water satisfactory for drinking
purposes, dispensed in a sanitary manner. The employer shall either furnish
individual drinking utensils for such employees or provide for the
dispensation of drinking water in such a manner as to make individual
drinking utensils unnecessary.

sections.heading: Whoever violates the provisions of this Act shall be guilty of a petty
sections.text:
offense and shall be fined not less than $5 nor more than $50 for each
offense.
